name: A Box Of Dreams
description:
Have you ever wondered what cats dream about?

In this game made for the 2019 Epic MegaJam, you'll be able to at least figure out what these three cats are dreaming about.

In this game you're helping them get safely through their strange dream. You'll experience flying in a cardboard box in space, fighting vacuum cleaners and collecting (and eating) cans of delicious tuna, while avoiding asteroids. Oh, and the cats can shoot lasers from their eyes, that's pretty neat!

Good luck, and I hope you enjoy the game!

(If you are not one of the Epic MegaJam judges, download the .zip file appropriate to your operating system. The named version, is just the 64-bit version named according to the Epic MegaJam standards.)
